title: The Contest Fractures
outcome: Neighborhood assemblies compete to win AI’s next inheritance protocols, but alliances fracture as sabotage and dirty secrets erupt. Rival groups unearth overlapping BCI abuses, sparking trust crises and open conflict beneath surface unity.

events.description: Neighborhood assemblies form competing alliances, trading information and control over BCI contest protocols. Rivalries emerge as groups accuse each other of cheating.
A coordinated sabotage effort exposes data from 2023 BCI expansions, implicating multiple factions in historic abuses. Smaller coalitions demand restitution or threaten to leave the contest.
Tense forums erupt as communities are forced by the AI riddle to reveal minor and major infractions from years of BCI scoring. Old grievances resurface, undermining fragile alliances.
Open street confrontations and graffiti campaigns break out. Slogans like 'No Winners, Only the Watched' and 'Score Us All' spread, as faith in the inheritance contest falters.
Temporary order is imposed as leading assemblies call for a cooling-off period. Public tension lingers, and rumors suggest the Council plans a heavy-handed restoration if chaos returns.
